definition: to carry (hanging down from the hand)/to lift/to put forward/to mention/to raise (an issue)/upwards character stroke/lifting brush stroke (in painting)/scoop for measuring liquid
neck/collar/to lead/to receive/classifier for clothes, mats, screens etc

sentences.english: This is my baggage claim tag.
Excuse me, where is the baggage claim area?
sentences.chinese: 對不起，哪裏是行李提領區？

sentences.english: It's for security. Then you can withdraw money with it.
sentences.chinese: 這是安全措施，你可以用這個密碼提領現金。

sentences.english: Excuse me, where is the im area?
sentences.chinese: 抱歉，哪裏是行李提領區？

sentences.english: Where is the baggage claim area?
Can I see your claim tag, please?
sentences.chinese: 可以給我看您的行李提領牌嗎？

sentences.english: I want to withdraw two thousand dollars from my account.
sentences.chinese: 我要從我的戶頭提領兩千元。

sentences.english: Nope. I can use the credit card to withdraw the money in foreign countries.
sentences.chinese: 沒有，但是我可以用信用卡在國外提領現金。

sentences.english: Do you also want to take out money with a bank card?
sentences.chinese: 你想用銀行卡提領一些錢出來嗎？

sentences.english: Would you show me the baggage claim area for China Airline Flight 656?
sentences.chinese: 請問國航656班機的行李提領區在哪裏？

sentences.english: I don't like to take out more than fifty dollars at a time from a cash machine.
sentences.chinese: 我不想從銀行提款機一次提領超過五十元。

sentences.english: Here are your baggage claim stubs, miss.
sentences.chinese: 這裏是你們的行李提領存根。

sentences.english: She has to withdraw some money from the ATM.
sentences.chinese: 她得從自動提款機提領一些錢。

sentences.english: Do you also want to apply for a Visa or Master card?
sentences.chinese: 你想用銀行卡提領一些錢出來嗎？

sentences.english: Excuse me, wITe is the baggage claim are nota?
sentences.chinese: 對不起，什麼地方是行李提領區？

definition: to disappear without trace/to vanish all of a sudden/to spread fast/to spread like wildfire
variant of 巨額|巨额[ju4 e2]
to search for and seize (criminals, smuggled goods etc)
